column4: Hi the network manager is not connecting me to a connection What can i do
Hi the network manager is not connecting me to a connection What can i do
Hi the network manager is not connecting me to a connection What can i do
Is there a command to connect to a wireless connection
yeah you can setup the wlan connection using iwconfig/wpa_supplicant manualy
but using the networkmanager is much easier
sure your key is right? and that you selected the right otions?
? you putyour card in monitor mode?
thats mostlikely why it doesnt work
yeah do sudo iwconfig interface mode managed
it should be back to the normal operation mode after that
replace interface with the actual interface name
in the command replace interface with eth1 or whatever  your wlan interface is named
in a terminal do sudo iwconfig, and note the name of the interface where it shows it has the wireless extension
then type sudo iwconfig whatever_the_name_was mode managed
